mapper.insert: insert into information(title, content, authors, release_time, category) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{authors}, #{releaseTime}, #{category})
mapper.update: update information set title = #{title}, authors = #{authors}, content = #{content}, release_time = #{releaseTime}, category = #{category} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from information where id between #{start} and #{offset}
select * from information where category = #{category} limit #{start}, #{offset}
